abstract: With its European sales down sharply, Toyota said it would stop making cars for short periods at plants in France and Britain.
snippet: With its European sales down sharply, Toyota said it would stop making cars for short periods at plants in France and Britain.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — Toyota Motor said on Friday that it would idle three plants in France and Britain for a total of 14 days to reduce inventory amid recent recalls and a slump in European sales.

headline.main: Toyota Slows Production in Europe as Sales Lag
headline.print_headline: Toyota Slows Production in Europe as Sales Lag
